articles.content: Josh Warrington has announced that Luke Ayling will be joining him for his ring walk ahead of his rematch fight with Kiko Martinez on Saturday. The featherweight boxer nicknamed The Leeds Warrior is … [+2123 chars]

articles.title: O2 Inside Line | The Next Level | Defeat in Paris - England Rugby
articles.description: England travelled to Paris to take on France in the final round of the Guinness Six Nations with the hosts looking to secure a Grand Slam.

articles.title: After Phil Mickelson's Masters retreat the Saudis remain ready to plug $35m hole in his wallet - The Telegraph

articles.content:

articles.title: Rotherham and Wigan Fixtures Move - Ipswich Town News - TWTD.co.uk
articles.description: Town’s game at Rotherham United has moved from Good Friday to the Saturday for live Sky coverage, while the home match against Wigan Athletic has moved to the Tuesday as a result.
